name: Crystal On Demand
description:
Hi there, thanks for your visit.

This game is submitted to metroidvania month 18 jam.

Control:

  • A / D to move left or right
  • W / S to look up or down
  • Space to jump.
  • F to interact.
  • Hold R to activated teleportation scroll.
  • Primary mouse button to attack.
  • Secondary mouse button to throw projectile. 
  • Hold LShift while throwing projectile to throw at cursor position.
  • Escape to pause/resume the game or exit from the shop. ( I hope you don't mind playing non-fullscreen. There are currently issues when playing on full screen. However, if you find the tile breaking on a non-fullscreen, try zooming in / out your browser. Really sorry for that.)

Something you may want to know:

  • There is a total of 4 skills for the player to obtain, two movement skills and two combat skills.
  • Without complete movement skills, the player can get stuck. You can use teleportation in this case.
  • Activating the teleportation scroll will cost 5 blue crystals / 3 red crystals / 1 teal crystal. The player can still try to activate the scroll even without any crystals, however, there will be a 50% chance of fail activation.
  • Player attack priority is: enemy > enemy projectile > props.

Seem like my current skill isn't enough to complete the game within the given time. So you may find something unfitting, incomplete, some typos, and a forced story. If you find any of that or if you have any suggestions, feel free to leave a comment, I will really appreciate that.
